node.doctext:
This group exists solely for the purpose of discussing node title conventions and policies, and for maintaining the documents which present them:

  • [Pick Titles Carefully]

  • [Using Special Characters in Titles] (experimental)

  • [Gritchka's Style Guide]

  • [Warning Signs that you may not have chosen the right title] (under construction)

The group's membership is limited to the people allowed to maintain these documents. Don't call us, we'll call you.
node.title: SIGTITLE
